Hi, I'm Shlok Limbhare

Machine Learning Engineer

Specializing in GPU kernel programming, CUDA optimization, and high-performance computing for deep learning acceleration. Passionate about pushing the limits of hardware efficiency and building optimized compute kernels for CUDA and AMD ROCm platforms.

View My Work Get In Touch

About Me

GPU Kernel Engineer focused on accelerating inference workloads and pushing the limits of hardware efficiency. I build optimized compute kernels for CUDA and AMD ROCm platforms, with deep interest in low-precision arithmetic, HPC inference, and end-to-end pipeline profiling for large models.

Featured Projects

100 Days of CUDA

GitHub

Documented a structured 100-day learning journey in CUDA, covering core concepts, memory hierarchy, and kernel optimizations. Developed and profiled high-performance CUDA kernels with Streams, Shared Memory Tiling, Unified Memory, and Loop Unrolling. Implemented Tensor Core acceleration with WMMA and achieved 3x-5x speed improvements in various CUDA-based workloads.

CUDA C++ GPU Computing Parallel Programming

AMD MI300X GPU Kernels

GitHub

Developed HIP-based double-buffered matrix multiplication kernels supporting FP8 blockwise computation using MFMA intrinsics on AMD MI300X. Built optimized inference modules for Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) and MLA (Multi-head Latent Attention) decoding targeting large model inference. Benchmarked performance using Popcorn's eval harness to validate throughput, latency, and scaling behavior.

HIP ROCm FP8 MI300X AI/ML

Experience

Houdini FX Artist

DNEG 2021 - 2024

Created high-quality dynamic VFX simulations including smoke, water, debris, and sand using Houdini. Collaborated with lighting and compositing teams to ensure seamless integration of FX into final shots. Optimized simulation setups for performance and memory usage while maintaining visual fidelity.

  • Delivered procedural FX for both feature films and episodic content under tight deadlines
  • Used VEX and Python scripting to build reusable digital assets and tools for the FX pipeline
  • Optimized simulation workflows for performance and memory efficiency
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams including lighting, compositing, and rendering departments
